title: Add crackers burst, improve letter contrast, add kiss pattern, fix butterfly rendering

requirements.summary: Add a crackers burst animation effect that plays at an appropriate moment in the experience
acceptanceCriteria: Crackers burst animation is visible and plays at least once
Animation timing fits naturally within the existing flow
Visual effect is celebratory and matches the romantic theme

file_operations.description: Add crackers burst animation that triggers during the intro or at a transition moment. Implement using CSS animations or canvas-based particles to create a celebratory burst effect with confetti/crackers that matches the romantic pink theme. Position and time the animation to play naturally within the existing flow without disrupting the user experience.

requirements.summary: Ensure letter text has sufficient contrast against the background so it is clearly readable
acceptanceCriteria: Letter text is clearly visible against pink gradient background
Text remains legible throughout all animations

file_operations.description: Improve letter text contrast by adjusting text color, adding text shadow, or implementing a semi-transparent overlay behind the text within the letter area. Ensure the text remains clearly readable against the pink gradient background and any background patterns throughout all animation states.

requirements.summary: Fill the letter area with kiss graphics as a background pattern that does not obscure the text content
acceptanceCriteria: Kiss graphics appear as a subtle background pattern within the letter area
All letter text remains fully readable over the kiss pattern
Kiss graphics enhance rather than compete with the text

file_operations.description: Add kiss pattern background to the letter area using the generated image frontend/public/assets/generated/kiss-mark.dim_64x64.png. Implement as a repeating CSS background-image with reduced opacity to create a subtle pattern that enhances the romantic theme without obscuring the letter text. Ensure proper layering so text remains on top and fully readable.

requirements.summary: Fix butterfly rendering so they display as proper butterfly shapes instead of boxes
acceptanceCriteria: Butterflies render as recognizable butterfly shapes
No box-like artifacts or placeholder shapes appear
Butterfly images load correctly and display smoothly

file_operations.description: Fix butterfly rendering by ensuring the butterfly images (frontend/public/assets/generated/butterfly-1.dim_200x200.png, butterfly-2.dim_200x200.png, butterfly-3.dim_200x200.png) load correctly with proper image paths and CSS styling. Remove any box-like placeholder styles, ensure transparent backgrounds are preserved, and verify images display as recognizable butterfly shapes with smooth animations.
